content: at least 14 rds plus cast on ending with c1 at the backside of the socks is growing a column of hanging yarns with 2 st inbetween if you look at it from the backside cuff down there is c2 on the left and c1 on the right side leg go on in stockinette except for the front pattern and the 2nd sts before and after the center back the sts are worked ktbl to stabilize the tails ktbl1 tail k1 center back k1 tail ktbl1 the c1- and c2-rds start and end the same as at the cuff immediately start with the front pattern see chart round 1 - c2 put the first two sts of the 1st needle onto the 4th needle leave tail ktbl1 k to 3 before the center front work row 1 of the front pattern chart k2 yo k1 slip marker if you set one k1 yo k2 k to 3 sts before end of round ktbl1 k2 leave tail cut yarn round 2 - c1 put 2 st of the 4th needle onto the 1st needle take darker yarn leave tail k2 ktbl1 k to 3 sts before center front work row 2 of the front pattern chart k2 drop yo sl1 sl1 drop yo k2 k to 1 st before end of round ktbl1 leave tail cut yarn round 3 c2 put the first two sts of the 1st needle onto the 4th needle k to 3 sts before the center front work row 3 of the front pattern chart k to 3 sts before end of round ktbl1 k2 leave tail cut yarn go on to 10 cm / 4 in of the leg or the desired length end with c2 repeat row 4-9 of the front pattern chart see special stitches heel start with the heel variation of pyramid heel see heel chart inbetween the tail edges 5/10 mohawk style v0 8 the two bors will move away from each other use the 6th / 3rd circular needle for the increases sl 1st st before and 1st st after the center back to the 6th / 3rd needle round 1 c1 with 6th / 3rd needle leave tail k1 m1l k1 with 1st to 4th needle ktbl1 k to front pattern work front pattern k to 1 before end of round ktbl1 leave tail cut yarn round 2 c2 with 1st needle leave tail ktbl1 k to front pattern work front pattern k to last st of 4th needle ktbl1 with 6th / 3rd needle k1 m1r k new st k1 leave tail cut yarn round 3 c1 with 6th / 3rd needle leave tail k3 m1l k1 with 1st to 4th needle kbtl1 k to front pattern work front pattern k to last st of 4th needle kbtl1 leave tail cut yarn go on until you have 11/15/19 more sts on your needles ending with c1 for the next rounds take larger scraps e g 15 g each because
